General.Name: Ibase Gaming
General.Description: Ibase Gaming Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells gaming systems and energy storage equipment worldwide. It offers gaming solutions for lottery terminals, kiosks, and casino slots. The company also provides OEM and turnkey ODM solutions for terminals, cabinets, PC hardware, and gaming support peripherals. Ibase Gaming Inc. was founded in 2011 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 93, Building D, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 221
